column4: hey guys, I am using wordpress on ubunto server, when I connect with ftp it always put me in /root, but I installed my wordpress stuff in /var/www is this ok?
is it supposed to be root/var/www or something?
you should not login as root, via ftp. you should not log into ftp at all
besides that, its fine. ftp (and lots of other services including ftps, sftp, ssh) put you in your homedirectory
